conclusion: Use principles of optics related to light refraction and refractive index of water.
Refractive index n_1 for monochromatic light A and n_2 for monochromatic light B are given.
Calculate sine of refraction angle for monochromatic light B.
Monochromatic light A is incident on the water surface.
Monochromatic light B is incident on a larger area of water.
Refractive index of water to monochromatic light A is n_1.
Refractive index of water to monochromatic light B is n_2.
Angle of incidence theta is the same for both light sources.
Sine of refraction angle for monochromatic light B is the same as for monochromatic light A.
Sine value of refraction angle of monochromatic light B at boundary of small circle area equals sine value for monochromatic light A.
Sine value of refraction angle of monochromatic light B at boundary of small circle area is sin(theta).
